languages.text: {n}На ваш взгляд мужчины перед вами выглядят примерно одинаково за исключением возраста. Все служители Экклезиархии похожи друг на друга в своей истовой вере.{/n}
{n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На ваш взгляд мужчины перед вами выглядят примерно одинаково за исключением возраста. Все служители Экклезиархии похожи друг на друга в своей истовой вере.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}
{n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}
{n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

{n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}
{n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

languages.text: {n}除了年龄截然不同之外，眼前这两个人几乎没有区别。国教所有的仆人，看起来都差不了多少。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}除了年龄截然不同之外，眼前这两个人几乎没有区别。国教所有的仆人，看起来都差不了多少。{/n}

languages.text: {n}年齢を除けば、目の前の二人の男はかなりよく似ていた。帝国聖教会に仕えるすべての者は、不屈の信仰において一つである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年齢を除けば、目の前の二人の男はかなりよく似ていた。帝国聖教会に仕えるすべての者は、不屈の信仰において一つである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aparte de su edad, los dos hombres que tienes delante parecen muy similares. Todos los siervos de la Eclesiarquía son iguales en su indómita fe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparte de su edad, los dos hombres que tienes delante parecen muy similares. Todos los siervos de la Eclesiarquía son iguales en su indómita fe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önündeki iki adam, yaşları haricinde oldukça epey benziyor. Tüm Ekleşiarşi hizmetkârları, boyun eğmez inançlarında birdir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki iki adam, yaşları haricinde oldukça epey benziyor. Tüm Ekleşiarşi hizmetkârları, boyun eğmez inançlarında birdir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'exception de leur âge, les deux hommes qui se tiennent devant vous se ressemblent énormément. Tous les serviteurs de l'Ecclésiarchie ne font qu'un dans leur foi indomptable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'exception de leur âge, les deux hommes qui se tiennent devant vous se ressemblent énormément. Tous les serviteurs de l'Ecclésiarchie ne font qu'un dans leur foi indomptable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abgesehen vom Alter sehen die beiden Männer vor dir recht ähnlich aus. Alle Diener der Ekklesiarchie sind in ihrem unerschütterlichen Glauben eins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Apart from their age, the two men before you look fairly similar. All servants of the Ecclesiarchy are as one in their indomitable faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abgesehen vom Alter sehen die beiden Männer vor dir recht ähnlich aus. Alle Diener der Ekklesiarchie sind in ihrem unerschütterlichen Glauben eins.{/n}
